mapper.select: SELECT c.hotelSeq, c.hotelName, c.hotelAddress, c.facilities, c.stars, c.swimmingPool, c.fitnessCenter, c.roomService, c.spa, c.wifi, c.parking, c.hvac, c.smokingArea, c.pets, c.hotel_delNy, c.hotel_useNy, c.hotelDesc FROM hotel c ORDER BY c.hotelSeq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel ( hotelName, hotelAddress, facilities, stars, swimmingPool, fitnessCenter, roomService, spa, wifi, parking, hvac, smokingArea, pets, hotel_delNy, hotel_useNy, hotelDesc ) VALUES ( #{hotelName}, #{hotelAddress}, #{facilities}, #{stars}, #{swimmingPool}, #{fitnessCenter}, #{roomService}, #{spa}, #{wifi}, #{parking}, #{hvac}, #{smokingArea}, #{pets}, 0, #{hotel_useNy}, #{hotelDesc} )
